import './App.css' import {useState} from 'react' import CreateItem from './CreateItem' import ItemsList from './ItemsList' function App() { const [items, setItems] = useState([ { title: 'Item 1', content: 'This is the content of item 1', }, { title: 'Item 2', content: 'This is the content of item 2', }, ]) const addItem = (title, content, where = items.length) => setItems([ ...items.slice(0, where), {title, content}, ...items.slice(where), ]) return (
setItems(items.filter((_, index) => index !== key)) } />
) } export default App
